page.description: Class for storing subreport definitions (used to nest reports).

property.name: Calcs
property.description: Type "C". Calculated fields to define for report

property.name: Parameters
property.description: Type "C". Parameters to define for report.

property.name: Subreport_Name_Placeholder
property.description: Type "C". Placeholder name (used to replace subreport content when it is evaliated)

property.name: Grand
property.description: Type "ReportGroupDef". Pointer to top level report grouping definition.

property.name: Group
property.description: Type "ReportGroupDef". Pointer to groups in report

property.name: Detail
property.description: Type "ReportGroupDef". Pointer to detail level of report.

methodref.name: EnumArguments
methodref.description: Return a cr-lf delimited list of arguments passed (from parent contexts) to this report.

methodref.name: EnumGroups
methodref.description: Return a cr-lf delimited list of groups.

methodref.name: EnumParameters
methodref.description: Return a cr-lf delimited list of parameters defined AND arguments from parent contexts.

methodref.name: EnumSubReport
methodref.description: Return a cr-lf delimited list of subreports - if recurseSeparator is provided, returns the hierarchy.

methodref.name: GetGroup
methodref.description: Return group from name (includes grand and detail).

methodref.name: GetSubReport
methodref.description: Retrieve a subreport definition by name.

methodref.name: GroupNumber
methodref.description: Get the index of a Group from the name.

methodref.name: MoveGroup
methodref.description: Move a block of Group items.
